about.title: About Us
about.description: Shaping the world of things to come
about.vision_description: To lead in urban development with a global and sustainable outlook, reflecting our company's ambition—from the heart of the world to its farthest horizons.
about.vision_description_part_one: We'd love to share more with you, please complete this form and our dedicated team will get back to you shortly.
about.vision_description_part_two: In markets from renewable energy, sports and entertainment, to data centers and healthcare, we work to ensure the built environment leaves a lasting positive impact. Together, we strive to make your project better than you imagined possible.
about.mission_description: We create high-quality, culturally rich real estate aligned with global standards, meeting client needs through thoughtful planning and sustainable development.
about.values_description: At Arx, we uphold quality, integrity, and client focus—driven by initiative, growth, and accountability to build trust and deliver lasting value in every project.

big_cards.first_card_description: We maintain this by ensuring transparency and professional conduct in every aspect.
big_cards.second_card_description: We work with both investors and developers to create landmarks that make an impact.
big_cards.third_card_description: To empower businesses with cutting-edge web solutions that enhance their digital presence and drive growth.

our_features.title: Genuine partner in every aspect of development
our_features.description: We take immense pride in our commitment to providing unparalleled service excellence to our valued customers.

Residential.title: Residential
Residential.description: Discover residential units that combine contemporary design with practical comfort, offering privacy, functionality, and a balanced lifestyle for individuals and families alike.

Medical.title: Medical
Medical.description: Premium medical units crafted for efficient care, equipped with advanced facilities to support better workflow, accurate diagnosis, and exceptional patient outcomes.

Administrative.title: Administrative
Administrative.description: Our multi-skilled team provides innovative, forward-thinking solutions.

Commercial.title: Commercial
Commercial.description: Elevate your business with flexible spaces tailored for all industries and sizes. Enjoy modern infrastructure, premium facilities, and a dynamic community that redefines growth and productivity.

our_team.title: Our Team
our_team.description: Meet the people who make it all happen
our_team.chairman_of_the_board_of_directors_speec: Chairman Of The Board Of Directors Speech
our_team.ahmed_job: Chairman of ARX Real Estate Development
our_team.yasser_job: CEO of ARX Real Estate Development
our_team.saad_job: Board member at ARX Real Estate Development
our_team.osama_job: Board member of ARX Real Estate Development
our_team.ahmed_describe: Dr. Ahmed Omar combines decades of experience with a visionary approach, leading the company to redefine excellence through innovation, quality, and trust—setting new industry benchmarks and guiding ARX to global leadership in real estate.
our_team.yasser_describe: Yasser Omar drives the company forward with strategic insight and market awareness, delivering innovative, high-quality projects focused on sustainability, client satisfaction, and growth—ensuring ARX remains competitive and influential in today's evolving real estate landscape.
our_team.saad_describe: Saad brings deep industry expertise and forward-thinking leadership. He plays a key role in shaping ARX's strategic direction, driving innovation and sustainability to ensure every project aligns with global standards and market expectations.
our_team.osama_describe: Dr. Osama Omar leads with strategic vision and a passion for excellence, helping ARX push boundaries in real estate innovation, sustainability, and quality—setting the stage for lasting impact and continued success in the industry.

footer.footer_description: Whether you're exploring our homes or envisioning something custom, we're here to bring your dream to life.
